entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 100 %

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
